articles.title: India, China hold Major General-level talks on LAC issues - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The talks took place in the run-up to Prime Minister Narendra Modi attending the Brazil, Russia, India, China, South Africa (BRICS) Summit in South Africa’s Johannesburg on August 22-24 | Latest News India
articles.content: Days after the Indian Army and the Chinese Peoples Liberation Army (PLA) held the 19th round of military dialogue to cool tensions in the Ladakh sector, the two sides on Friday held major-general lev… [+2582 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: ECOWAS defence chiefs agree ‘D-day’ for Niger military intervention - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: West African bloc agrees to activate standby force as a last resort if diplomatic efforts fail after coup in Niger.
articles.content:
West Africas main bloc has agreed on a D-day for possible military intervention to restore democracy in Niger after generals toppled and detained President Mohamed Bazoum last month.
